name: Doomsday Filet
description:
Hello, and welcome to Doomsday Filet!

In our game, you're a fisherperson with the goal of catching, reeling and flinging your fish across the map at opponents to knock them off their boat and syphon their fuel. Use the in game mechanics to play around in the environment, get a hold of the feelings and please answer our Questionnaire! 

Thanks for your time!

Controls

Controller / Gamepad (Preferable!)

  • Movement - Left Joystick: 
  • Swing Rod / Line - Right Joystick: 
  • Add Nodes /Extend Line - Right Trigger
  • Delete Nodes / Shorten Line - Left Trigger
  • Drain from Boat - Bottom Face Button (A/X)

Keyboard:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Swing Rod / Line - IJKL
  • Add Nodes /Extend Line - E
  • Delete Nodes / Shorten Line - Q
  • Drain from Boat - Hold F

Questionnaire for current build (0.0.4): https://forms.gle/zPgMgofkDR5YvKYX9
